name: Vectronom
description:
Description
Vectronom is a music platformer. The game combines challenging platforming with rhythm based gameplay. The architecture of each level changes with the music, players have to memorize patterns and overcome obstacles while dancing through the game world. Unlike other beat matching games where the player has to follow prompts, in Vectronom players have a larger degree of freedom while playing.Story
You are a cube in a world ruled by music color and geometry. Navigate, explore and move on beat to solve puzzles and complete levels that will bring you closer to being the coolest rhythm master cube.How to play?You play with the arrow keys (WASD). We recommend headphones or speakers when playing, the key is to dance as much as possible to follow the beat seamlessly.Features
  • Music platformer
  • Striking, minimalist art style
  • Intense electronic music
  • Non-linear rhythm based gameplay
  • Simple four directional controls
  • Single player campaign
  • Local, drop in drop out multiplayer
  • Challenging gameplay
